thread.title: Alcatel OneTouch Flash 2 Launch Set for September 22
thread.title_full: Alcatel OneTouch Flash 2 Launch Set for September 22

title: Alcatel OneTouch Flash 2 Launch Set for September 22
text:
Alcatel OneTouch Flash 2 Launch Set for September 22 by NDTV Correspondent , 9 September 2015 
Alcatel OneTouch has announced that its upcoming Flash 2 smartphone will be launching on September 22. 
The company has revealed that the Alcatel OneTouch Flash 2 will be announced at an online press conference and will be live streamed at the company website . In an email sent to media, the company confirms that the OneTouch Flash 2 smartphone will feature a 5-inch display. The company's teaser images for the handset also include a tagline that says, "The power of green." The rear camera can also be seen sporting a metal rim around the sensor at the back. 
To recall, the Alcatel OneTouch Flash was unveiled in September last year. The single-SIM Alcatel OneTouch Flash ran Android 4.4 KitKat out-of-the-box and came with a 5.5-inch IPS display with a resolution of 720x1280 pixels; powered by an octa-core 1.4GHz MediaTek MTK6592M processor; 1GB of RAM; a 13-megapixel autofocus rear camera with LED flash; 5-megapixel front-facing camera; 8GB internal storage; expandable storage via microSD card (up to 32GB); Wi-Fi; Bluetooth; GPRS/ EDGE; GPS; 3G, and a 3200mAh battery. The company last year marketed the OneTouch Flash as a Samsung Galaxy Note killer. We can expect the company to bring the new OneTouch Flash 2 with upgraded innards.
